name: The Purification
description:
The Purification is an Indie Survival Horror game developed by a one man army JK Productions.
The game concept is you are a soldier who is in a zombie infected asylum in Germany and you have to find a way out. You start unarmed but with 2 medipacks. You have to search the asylum for 2 key cards and turn on the power to escape. The whole thing is still in the Eary Access phase, later in the future it will be extended with a story. As an addition to the game there is a bonus level where you can shoot your way out of a graveyard!
